eng.sticker_subtitle: Help needed!!! DM IG @samalahkita.my to donate, and your collection + name will be displayed below as an appreciation <3
eng.sticker_mood: (Mood: Sad, Stumped, Anxious, Disappointed, Lonely, Given Up, Bored, etc.)
